entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:09 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 12:09 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
